name: Dance Hotspot
content:
# Dance Hotspot 
 --- 
Through [XFactor Consultants](https://xfactorconsultants.com)
### MVP
A complimentary app integrating with Facebook to easily find Swing-Dancing events nearby, with auto-attendance via geofencing and analytics for event hosts.
https://dancehotspot.com
### Stack
* React-Native (Expo Managed)
* Express
* MySQL (Sequelize ORM)

name: Parkshark
content:
# ParkShark
---
Through [XFactor Consultants](https://xfactorconsultants.com)
### MVP
Airbnb but for parking spaces. 
https://parkshark.app
### Stack
* React-Native (Expo Managed)
* Laravel (php)
* MySQL

name: TP-Link Webapp
content:
# TP-Link Webapp
---
Personal Project
### MVP
The *only* webapp that allows control of TP-Link smarthome devices. Developed using an npm package based on reverse-engineering the android app.
https://colinmcneil.me/TP-Link-WebApp/
### Stack
* Nuxt (Vue.js)

name: PCM Toolset
content:
# PCM Device Report
---
For [UConn](https://uconn.edu/)
### MVP
Integrate with JAMF API to provide reporting on last checkin and battery status to gain live insights into classroom computers that may have been unplugged, stolen, or misplaced.
### Stack
* Laravel (php)
* React
* MySQL
* IIS

name: RDP Lab Scheduler
content:
# RDP Lab Scheduler
---
For [UConn](https://uconn.edu/)
### MVP
Leverage existing on-campus lab machines as additional remote resources for UConn affiliates. Schedules time on a lab machine, and generates an RDP file for the user to use. After their time is over, they are logged out of the machine.
### Stack
* Laravel (php)
* MySQL
* IIS

name: Tea as Art
content:
# Tea Art
---
For [Class](https://uconn.edu/)
### MVP
Exploring tea as an artform for a class on Asian Art
https://colinmcneil.me/tea-art/ceremony/
### Stack
* Nuxt (Vue.js)

name: Cider
content:
# Cider
---
For [UConn Research](https://ovpr.uconn.edu/)
### MVP
An in-house fork of Northwestern University's Core Facilities management program. 
Includes complete redesign, multiple new components, and integration with UConn systems. Much of my code was forked upstream and is being used across multiple institutions, including Dartmouth.
https://cider.uconn.edu/facilities
### Stack
* Ruby on Rails

name: squared labs
content:
# Squared Labs Homepage
---
For [UConn Research](https://ovpr.uconn.edu/)
### MVP
The homepage for the Center for Open Resources & Equipment (CORE)'s in-house software group, SquaredLabs.
https://squaredlabs.uconn.edu/
### Stack
* Nuxt
* Directus (Headless CMS for MySQL)
